com.gfycat.picker

Class GfycatPickerFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • com.gfycat.picker.GfycatPickerFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener

    public class GfycatPickerFragment
extends android.support.v4.app.Fragment
    This is a standalone Gfycat picker. Displays a selection of top categories, recently tapped Gfycats category. Provides a search Gfycat user interface.

    Subscribe for onGfycatSelected event to get a Gfycat object user has selected.

    Set accentTint parameter to customize the accent color of a Picker for your app needs.

    NOTE: GfyCore needs to be initialized before this Fragment is used.

    See http://developers.gfycat.com/androidsdk/#gfycat-picker-fragment for more integration details.

      • onCreateSearchView

        @NonNull
public SearchController onCreateSearchView(@NonNull
                                                    android.view.ViewGroup container)
        Called to have the fragment instantiate its Search View. This is optional, and if not overridden default search view will be used.

        This will be called in onCreateView(LayoutInflater, ViewGroup, Bundle).

        Parameters:
        container - Search View should be added to this ViewGroup object.
        Returns:
        Return a SearchController instance, can not be null.
